name: SugarWinds: Prologue
description:
The Prologue version features the same as the full version with some limitations:

1. Game can't be saved.
2. Limited amount of buildings in a city.
3. Limited amount of vessels to trade worldwide.
4. Shorter story.



Enjoy it!
Peace and Love.



SugarWinds
The World Trade City Builder
Aatlantis Code
